description: This source file defines functions for extracting and formatting version information from a given info dictionary. It includes functions to parse version details and return a version list or string.

methods.name: GetVersion(info)
methods.description: Extracts and returns a list of major, minor, and patch version numbers from the provided info dictionary.

methods.name: GetVersionString(info)
methods.description: Returns a dot-separated version string based on the version information extracted by GetVersion.
